column1: "description": "This panel has a linked alert rule."

"content": "# About this alerting dashboard

This dashboard includes several [panels with linked alert rules](https://grafana.com/docs/grafana/latest/alerting/alerting-rules/link-alert-rules-to-panels/). You can find these panels on the left side:

- Random Single Serie

- Random Multiple Series

- Users & PageViews

- Browser market share > 50%

Below is a list of useful alert examples available in Play.



- [Example of multi-dimensional alerts on time series data](/alerting/grafana/dep7osljedaf4a/view)

- [Example of alerting on tabular data](/alerting/grafana/eep7osljocvswa/view)

- [Example of dynamic thresholds](/alerting/grafana/aep7osljvuku8e/view)

- [Example of dynamic labels](/alerting/grafana/eep7oslk5u680e/view)


The panel below — Alerts linked to this dashboard — is an Alert list visualization. Learn more about this visualization on this [Play dashboard](/d/bdodlcyou483ke/alert-list)."
"description": "This panel has a linked alert rule."
"description": "This panel has a linked alert rule."
"description": "This panel has a linked alert rule.\n\nHowever
column2: the heart icon that displays the state of linked alert rules is currently only available in time series panels."
